title: Write unit tests for config service (config.ts)
description: Test getConfig/setProvider/setApiKey/clearConfig. Test maskApiKey with various lengths. Test setDefaultLength validation (boundaries: 0, 1, 100, 101). Test isConfigured() states.

comments.text: [lead-1] Moving to ready per QA request
36 unit tests for config service covering getConfig, isConfigured, setProvider, setApiKey, setDefaultLength, clearConfig, maskApiKey, getProviderInfo, boundary values
